hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Abu Hurairah through a different chain of narrators. This version does not mention the Prophet (May peace be upon him) i.e, it does not go back to him. It has :He must say: “My master” (sayyidi) and “My patron” (mawlaya)

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَقُولُ الْمَمْلُوكُ " رَبِّي وَرَبَّتِي "
chapter.eng-name: The slave should not say Rabbi or Rabbati (My lord, My lady)
